GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
media: coda: Add check for dcoda_iram_alloc

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit b99872178e7473f21904fdeea38109275aad8ae8, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit b313bcc9a46795c0233a765411cef9a15caaa7fb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: coda: Add check for dcoda_iram_alloc
